thread.section_title: Aberdeen Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and nice
thread.title_full: Clean and nice - Review of Aberdeen Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jaeols
title: Clean and nice
text: Not very luxurious, but everything you need for a wee in Rome. Classic old building. Nice smiling and helpful people everywhere. And its not very expensive. The location is perfect for the big sights and also for the park surrounding villa Borghese. You have to walk to find a decent restaurant, but who cares.
